sections.title: Getting Started with Scratch
sections.content: Learn about the Scratch programming environment and how to create your first project.
sections.activity: Create a simple animation of a cat walking across the screen in Scratch.

sections.title: Making Things Move
sections.content: Explore how to make sprites move and interact in your Scratch projects.
sections.activity: Create a simple game where you control a character to collect items.

sections.title: Adding Sounds and Music
sections.content: Learn how to incorporate sounds and music into your Scratch projects.
sections.activity: Create a virtual musical instrument in Scratch that plays different sounds when keys are pressed.

sections.title: Storytelling with Scratch
sections.content: Use Scratch to create interactive stories with multiple scenes and characters.
sections.activity: Create a short, interactive story with at least two characters and three scenes.
